about_the_game:
Gamepad and Comics - A Wonderful Reading Experience

Through Gamepad and Comics, a whole new way of reading comics! Whether you are a casual reader or a seasoned comic enthusiast, Gamepad and Comics offers a feature-rich, customized experience to cater to your needs.

Main Features:

Multiple Control Methods:

- Keyboard: Quick and easy navigation for a delightful reading experience.

- Gamepad: Perfect hands-free operation for an immersive comic journey.

- Mouse: Easy browsing and scrolling to enjoy the comics.

Multiple Reading Modes:

- Double-page Reading: Supports Japanese manga format with a double-page display for enhanced immersion.

- Single-page Reading: Focus on the details of each page for a clearer reading experience.

- Vertical Scrolling: Perfect for vertical comics, offering smooth up/down scrolling for uninterrupted enjoyment.

- Horizontal Scrolling: Ideal for horizontal comics, providing smooth left/right scrolling for perfect presentation.

Flexible Format Conversion:

- Easily convert comics into PDF, PPT, and EPUB formats.

- Share, print, or read comics on different devices anytime, anywhere.

LAN Sync Support:

- Easily access your comic resources stored on your computer via LAN.

- Sync your comic resources to mobile devices without needing an internet connection.

PDF (Pseudo) Support:

- Smoothly read PDF format comics without additional software.

Data Archiving (Pseudo) Feature:

- Like game saves, Gamepad and Comics allows you to export and import saves between devices.

- Whether using a computer, tablet, or phone, you can sync your current data seamlessly.

Programmable Interface:

- JavaScript Script Integration: Write scripts to interact with comic datasets and unlock more features.

- Customize your reading experience with personalized scripts for more convenience.

For All Comic Enthusiasts, Gamepad and Comics provides rich features and tools, including script support tailored for advanced users and convenient sync options, making it suitable for any comic lover’s needs. Whether you're at home or on the go, Gamepad and Comics makes your comic reading experience easier and more convenient.

Gamepad and Comics, enhancing your comic reading experience!
